Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great craft beer bar with friendly staff and customers.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Large selection of beers, nice ones so you can try your luck they are all pretty good. Staff is kind and always helpful.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Lovely bar, Alex the bartender is a legend, very friendly and welcoming.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great bar, fantastic choice of beers (40) and nice people 🤩

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text:
That pub (?) is great. Of you like craft beer than this is a beer lover's heaven on earth...
They have 40 beers on tap, and you can have a tasting party of your own, since …

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Really good beer, the waiter was very kind, funny and fast at serving.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: This is a very nice place to try a copious variety of very fine beers. The atmosphere is pleasant, as well as the music and attention by its owner. Strongly recommended!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Very friendly staff, loads of great beers, not as busy as many of the other bars in such a busy city! Definitely worth a visit.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text:
What a wonderful place! Good music, tasty beer and a great bartender.
I just regret we didn't find out about this place before the last night in town. Would have been super fun to try more of the beers and to go on the Morebeer tour.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great selection of beers on tap, friendly service. Cant ask for more, would be happy to visit again

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: So many beers. And good ones! Helpful staff that usually know their stuff and can help make decisions. They rotate kegs pretty often. Definitely one of the top places my friend and I like to go to enjoy a good variety of unique beers.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Lovely small bar with a great selection of craft beer on tap. Hidden gem if you are a beer lover.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: This was our last stop on the "more beer" tour. It's a little ways outside the Centrum, but totally worth it. You're likely to have great beers with mostly locals at this place, which makes for a more genuine experience IMO.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Lively atmosphere with very friendly young barman. Seems mostly local patrons, so authentic suburban Amsterdam. Typical limited pub snack menu but excellent craft beer selection. Good destination after earning a beer from a walk in neighbouring Vondelpark. Growlers available as a takeaway.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Lots of beers on tap. Bartender likes to inform and explain. Ask about which flavor beers are avain3and explain what you like and you'll get a perfect beer to match. Friendly personnel and would highly recommend. Will come again for sure.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text:
Very good beer selection.
The barman was awesome and we felt like staying way more.
Will be back soon

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Amazing selection of beers with expert pourers. High quality snacks too.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great bar with a huge selection of beers!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great beers, friendly staff, tasty snacks. What's not to like.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Love craft beer place, bartenders are nice and cute, good selections of craft beers, and change the menu time to time, so you always can have some new beers.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Love this place. Friendly and patient staff who offer insights into the vast beer menu. It has outside seating to soak up the evening sun too.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Excellent collection on tap + very friendly and warm service. Very nice atmosphere.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: My favourite beer bar in town. 40 types of beer coming from small and big breweries. The crew is super nice.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Many beers you can choose from, everyone will find his or her favorite

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Definitely the place to be(er) in Amsterdam. A lot of choice between more unknown beers, good and fast service.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text:
Great selection, good atmosphere, friendly staff

Have visited Craft & Draft a handful of times, including a gathering of 10 …

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: A bit far from the station, but close to Vondelpark. Good place for a beer.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Awesome experience - great beer selection!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great local tap house featuring many local Dutch beers . Friendly and knowledgeable staff help you through the creative list of beers .

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great selection of draft beers. They have over 30 different beers on tap, and you can find one that you like. Staff is very friendly to explain the differences among every beer on a selected style and give good recommendations accordingly.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Nice and cozy place! Great variety of beer from best breweries!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great craft beer and a very friendly stuff

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great selection of beer but a tad pricey. But if you're looking for craft beer then this is your place. They had plenty of local ales as well as some from the UK,  USA and Germany. You could easily spend a lazy afternoon here. They offer a takeaway service so you can take some beer to the local park too which is a nice touch

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great craft beer bar with 40 beers on tap to chose from. Bartenders are knowledgeable and helpful as well. Highly recommended their own in-house brewed pale ale and double IPA. Good spot for a cold beer outside on a warm day

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great beer selection a really cool chill environment and our bar tender was the best you could ask for

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great pub with an astonishing variety of Beers on tap (40). Simple but tasty options to eat, nice decoration and great staff. We loved it and certainly recommend it.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Wow. Beer taps almost as far as the eye can see. Incredible range of beers (41 on tap). Great service. World class bar. Edit Dec 2018. Back again..It's just as good! Best bar staff ever- super passionate and some great recommendations for …

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Lots and lots of beers on tap and the barman is always happy to help you choose and explain. Place can get crowded, especially outside if it's sunny but the crowd is really nice there. Met several people there with who we ended speaking for quite a bit. Very nice beer, nice people, nice staff.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: A good selection of international beers. Nice outside seating area.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Excellent beer selection, bitterballen (from across the road) really special

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Always have great beer on tap!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Craft & Draft is the best bar we went to on our trip to Amsterdam. Jorik was our bartender and he was friendly, knowledgeable about the different beers and had great customer service! I highly recommend stopping by here to try one of their many beers on draft. We will be back!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Extensive beer selection on tap - nice and chilled atmosphere.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Alright so here's the thing - we finished the morebeertour here and after you have 2-3 beers in 3 other spots your mind's gonna be hazy. However, the barman here was the coolest, not only for his jokes and knowledge of beers, he also allowed us to stay after hours while he cleaned up to finish our beers.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Nice bar, good beers, the bartender is top and they give you free t-shirts if you do a "pub crawl" through 4 pubs and end there. Very cool

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Good staff and great beer list. They have snacks, but the whole thing is lacking the ambience that could make it great. Still one of my favourite beer bars in Amsterdam but holding back on the 5 because of the vibe

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Why have I never given any feedback on this place? Maybe I am too afraid to not do them justice enough, as this is one of the places, I've been, that deserves to get 6 stars out of the 5, you can give. The bartenders (especially Alex) is …

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: A very friendly bar which hosts a multitude of ales to suit all tastes. Prices of drinks are reasonable and staff are friendly and knowledgeable to assist you on finding the drink suited to your palate. …

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: In just one word: awesome! This place drew our attention from the outside and we couldn't have made a better choice than to try it! 41 beers on tap (never seen so many in one place)! The guys working there are really kind and passionate …

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Wide selection of gorgeous beers, friendly service, ok prices

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Brilliant service from the bar staff and delicious beers. The big 5 was our favourite. So easy to drink. It is somewhat expensive but that's to be expected from a specialty beer venue

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: If you like craft beer. This is the place. Ended up spending the entire afternoon there, considering I was only pooping in for one!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: We stumbled upon this bar when we were around in the neighbourhood as we waited for our reservation time at Blauw. This place is sort of "new" as I have heard, but their tap list is impressive, along with the bottle list. …

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great options for craft beers, huge variety!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Thought they were a bit pricey when I first looked at the menu but the super knowledgeable staff completely makes up for that. Pleasant vibe and lots of beers! Lots of dutch breweries which makes this a top pick for tourists that want to taste dutch beers!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: A low key bar (not a criticism) with a great selection of beers on tap from all over the world. Friendly and knowledgeable chaps behind the bar who can help you pick a beer based on your tastes, even for those who aren't regular beer drinkers.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Friendly, knowledgeable bartender. Great selection. Nifty growler system. Good prices.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Very nice pub in Amsterdam. Great offer of craft beers, kitchen only with snacks.  Good place to visit, Best then in morebeertour.nl event

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: My favourite spot for a nice beer (or 6). 30 or so different beers, with an always changing line up. Barman is a great guy who remembers you. Usually can get a table and hear your friends talking. Highly recommended

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Crafts and drafts is awesome. Love the bartender. Takes great care of his customers. Asks them what they like. You can choose from 40 different drafts. Loved it! Highly recommended.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Merk really knows his beer. Came in and looked for a Kriek, they didn’t have, but he steered me to a couple of sours that were nice options, including a “Craft and Draft” Collaboration beer with pears. Very enjoyable experience!  I’ll come back!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great place! Lots of beers to try! I would definitely go again!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Pretty good beer selection. Friendly staff and cozy atmosphere. I would definitely recommend if you are into craft beers. If you are from the United States you'll feel right at home with the beer selection.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Lovely friendly place with fantastic choice and very knowledgeable barman.  No problem going in as a woman on your own either.   Had a great time and glad I went.  Bit of a walk but well worth while.  Thank you!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Extensive and closely curated taps! Rock is playing all night long!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Although it is a half hour walk from where we normally stay in the city center, it is well worth the effort to make the trek down Overtoom to get to Craft & Draft. They always have e great beer selection and regularly hold events such as …

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Friendly folks, great selection of beer and depending who's behind the bar, an awesome playlist!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Superb beer bar. Lot of choices. Highly skilled bar man. He made us to  taste us many different beers. Simple and friendly bar. You can enjoy if you visit this place. Highly recommended. Five star rating

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Lovely little bar which loads of craft beers. Beer lovers dream

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: One of the best beer bars in town. Staff is wonderfully attentive, knowledgeable and friendly. Beer selection changes all the time and is always great

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Nice place a great selection of beers and an amazing service that what you will find in craft and draft. Also the prices are normal. A must visit if you are into craft beer.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great pub with a wide assortiment in exotic beers, you really need to come back to be able to try them all. Great friendly bartenders. Good place to go out with some friends and to still be able to talk with them ;)

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: One of the best selections of beer in Amsterdam. 30 taps with great stuff from the UK, Italy and other European breweries. Prices are unfortunately high, making for an expensive visit.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Friendly staff, and an awesome selection of local and foreign craft beers.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Really great place. A large beer collection, nice snacks with the food. Also really friendly staff, would highly recommend!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Fantastic craft ale bar with a wide variety of great beers to choose from. Very knowledgeable bar staff. Very close to Vondelpark so I recommend combining the two.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Went on a sunny Thursday. Had two delicious beers, and left with another after a great conversations and tasting sessions with the very knowledgeable staff. Will definitely be coming back. Evening sun on the terrace also helps!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Over 30 taps of beer to choose from. Great atmosphere knowledgeable staff and more beer than you can taste in one visit. Highly recommend!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Brilliant crafts and bar snacks. Awesome, entertaining staff. Highly recommend!! And the end of banging craft beer tour with a free t-shirt just for buying beer. Winner 🤗

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Nice place for craft beers. Can get crowded during tourist season though as this features on the Amsterdam beer tour. In winter though it's way less crowded

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Very nice place to hangout with friends enjoying a good craft beer. The bar man is nice and will let you try some of their 40+ craft beers menu before choosing one.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Awesome service, if you don't know which beer you prefer, the bartender goes around searching to help you. Besides that it's a cozy place to go alone or with a group

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great spot and our fourth craft beer bar visit of the day. Had to get the shirt. Great selection and a cool venue. Staff were cool. Get there.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Knowledgeable bar tender, great beer and easy vibe

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Many kinds of beers and the staff are nice

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Amazing selection of beers and very friendly bar staff. I would definitely recommend a visit.. easy way to lose an afternoon!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Nice place, great beers!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: The perfect place to have a beer with friends! Nice music, and The huge 40 tap line will make your choice tricky, but no worries the bar tender will help you make your choice!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Nice selection of craft beers. Chat to the staff about the styles as they are not immediately obvious. Nice strong selection and good to see they have a lot of dutch breweries.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Nice place, you can even taste the beer if you don't know what to choose. They have too many beers 😀

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Ask Merk about his favorite beer on tap - he's quiet but friendly. 40 taps and an even larger bottle selection. 'Tap takovers' and  'meet the brewer' events round out a well organized tap room. Near Vondlepark, it's a refreshing pit stop.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Awesome place! Great beers. Had great time with the staff, they know their stuff. I highly recommend

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Best place in Amsterdam to try beer. Friendly staff, the bartenders know plenty about the variaty of beers they offer in the bar. I recommend that you try the  beertasting! :) ♡ great place to spend time with friends or on a date ♡

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: I love this bar, especially when they had you draw a piece of paper from a box for every beer you had and if you picked certain ones you could get a prize. Honestly I never win anything and there I was the only one winning ahah. I know it was for the bar's bday, but please do it next year and I'll be there everyday

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Nice place to enjoy a large variety of beers and snacks. Nice staff and good music. A cross the road jst a nightshop you can get food sigarettes. And behind it lays the Vondelpark.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Amazing beers, nice relaxed atmosphere

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text:
dozens of Dutch and American beers on tap.

They also have a store front that can sell liters of anything on tap for take …

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great environment, a lot of beers on tap and a world of beers by bottle. Guys behind the bar are great and helpful. Helps great craft beer events!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great beers and super friendly staff!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: 40 different beers. I've tried half and were all very good. The staff really know their business. Highly recommended.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: One of the best beer places in town. Bartenders are very nice and will advise the best fit for your taste.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Excellent and huge assortment of draft beers. Very competent knowledgable staff. Be careful! It's very hard not to drink too much!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great place for beers, good music and great vibe. Friendly staff. Only bar snacks

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Good variety of beer on tap and couple of fillings on the menu for hipsters who don't like craft beer. Friendly stuff. Recommended.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great beer, very knowledgeable and friendly bar people. Great atmosphere. Recommended if you like craft beer.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Nice selection of beers on tap and a great place to go get growlers when chilling in Vondelpark on a sunny day! Staff is super friendly!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Amazing selection of beers, super friendly staff, relaxed atmosphere

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Excellent beer and customer service! You have 40 beers to choose from and our bartender let us sample them before committing!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Plenty of tasty craft beer! Not too big and not too crowded, a short walk from Vondelpark.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great bartender, knowing what he pours into the glass. If you're just starting your craft beer trip, this is the place where they can make your entrance smooooooth 😋

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Crazy friendly and knowledgeable staff and a impressively curated collection of draft beers. I highly recommend a visit for all lovers of beer :)

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Beer selection is amazing. Might be worth eating before or after, as they only have bar snacks

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: The most number of taps I've ever seen in Holland (40!), plus a small shop with some really rare stuff.  Bit of an out of the way place,  but really worth a visit if you're in the neighborhood

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text:
Had a lovely night there.
Great guy behind the counter.
Try out the Beer Tour 😁

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Not too busy on a Thursday evening. Big selection of draft beers. Great place to chat with friends and have some craft beers.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Nice beer bar. Good selection. Simple design, well done. Very friendly staff. I com back

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Beautiful beer, great selection and good spot. Sometimes a bit slow to serve you, but worth it in the end!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: 40 taps! And you can get them all to go as long as you buy them before 10pm. Atmosphere isn't special, but the beer selection and the service make up for it.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: A lot of beers! Lovely vibe, super friendly staff. Very knowledgeable of what they are selling.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: As the other 3 pubs in this chain, they offer a wide selection of beers. When we went there, there was only guy serving, so service was really slow.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great beers on tap, nice ambience, accessible location, and a good terrace (you can bring your own food as long as it's on the terrace). What else could you ask for?

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Amazing beer bar. huge selection, great outdoor terrace.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great beer selection, relaxed atmosphere in a quieter part of town.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Awesome, very homey place with great beer selection and friendly staff.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Small cozy bar with more than 40 craft beers on tap, from blonds and pale ales to stouts and porters. Limited food selection.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: We stopped here for the last bar of the Amsterdam Beer Tour and the place is very laid-back, easy going bar with a pleasant atmosphere and a great bartender who's friendly and knows his beers.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Really nice cozy pub close to Vondelpark. They have a large selection on tap beer. Also a lot of IPA.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great beer selection. Lots of Dutch craft beer as well as craft beer from other parts of Europe. 40 beers on tap

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great beer selection. A wee bit pricey and not the most amazing atmosphere, but the beer makes it worth it

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Generous selection of beers on tap. Take away beer in bottles and cans, as well as bottle filled on the spot from the tap. This can take a while if the beer is foamy.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Excellent service, bartender extremly helpful even for a very choosy customers. Big choice of draft, as well as bottled, beer.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Rapidly changing beers, so you won’t get bored with their selection. Great place, but busy sometimes and also a bit expensive.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: A great selection of beers and friendly bartenders. Bit pricy for the Dutch taste though:p

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great selection of craft beer from around the world really friendly service. All around great joint!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Very knowledgeable person in suggesting right taste of beer. A great place to spend your evening

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Huge selection of craft beers. Something for everyone. Great service.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Proper service. Nice selection of beers. Taste before buy. Cannot wish for more.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Cool calm place. Large choice of beer.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Large choice of beer ! Music rocks ! Enjoyable time there.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Love it! Great brews at a reasonable price. Perfect for a beer fanatic!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Good selection of beer. However it's a small bar with not too many seats

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Top place, 40+ artisanal beers on tap. The beer list is never the same, lots of variety!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: My favourite bar in Amsterdam. Great selection of beers and very friendly staff! :)

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: A really nice place with very good selection of beers. I hope I can will be back soon!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Not bad, some of the beers were more like sludge but I did enjoy myself there

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great beer house with large variety of beers and staff that know their “stuff”.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Did the beer tour... Been there,  done that, got the T-shirt. King's Day orange. Doing it again tomorrow to get the normal one 👍

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great place for a fun time, delicious seasonal beers and great staff

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: One of the best places for trying beers. They have at least 20 tab bears. Plus bears in the bottle

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great selection of beers. Staff knows the beers and are very keen to explain this to the customers.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: A lot of different beers, good service and nice locations. All you need in one!

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Waiter is nice, but the place is very quiet and not a lot of food options to go with the beer.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Love this place. Bartenders are friendly and very helpful when you don't know what to get.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Fairly long but still draft selection and small schizo bottle range. Bit dingy inside. Some ok stuff, but in no hurry to return

Review Text: Gold draft beers,nice atmosphere and friendly people. Excellent all around pub.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Looking for place to drink your afternoon beer in good atmosphere near Vondelpark? You are at right place.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Definitely great people! They know what you might like, would definitly come again! :D

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Impressive selection of beers on tap! The bartenders also really know their products.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Great selection of beer and friendly staff.

Name: Craft & Draft
Review Text: Amazing selection of beers. Definitely worth a stop for a pint

Review Text: Very wide selection of drafts. Friendly staff. Not cheap, but they'll let you sample before you pick your poison.
